notes:
Czech models for MorphoDiTa, providing morphological analysis, morphological generation and part-of-speech tagging.

The morphological dictionary is created from MorfFlex CZ 160310 and the PoS tagger is trained on Prague Dependency Treebank 3.0 (PDT).
title: Czech Models (MorfFlex CZ 160310 + PDT 3.0) for MorphoDiTa 160310
